Node.definition: = woman, who at some time called herself Mara (מָרָא) ► wife of Elimelech (אֱלִימֶלֶךְ) mother of Mahlon (מַחְלֹון) and Chilion (כִּלְיֹון) and mother in law of Ruth (רוּת) and Orpah (עָרְפָּה)
= a person connected by blood or by marriage
= a human being, animal, or supernatural being who is renowned for his characteristics, such as physical strength, power, bravery, skill, wealth, good character, or a combination thereof

= state in which a human being, animal, or deity is deemed worthy of respect because of characteristics such as physical strength, power, bravery, skill, wealth, good character, or a combination thereof
= a particular group or class of either people (as in a clan or tribe) or animals (as in a genus or species) that share common characteristics
= man; ◄ from Bethlehem (בֵּית לֶחֶם) ► husband of Noami (נָעֳמִי) father of Mahlon (מַחְלֹון) and Chilion (כִּלְיֹון) time of the Judges
= one or more words by which a person, deity, place or object is known, addressed, remembered, or referred to; ≈ regarded as a core element of one's identity
= man; ◄ son of Salma (שַׂלְמָא) Salmon (שַׂלְמֹון) ► husband of Ruth (רוּת) tribe of Judah (יְהוּדָה)

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

= woman; ◄ from Moab (מֹואָב) ► wife of Mahlon (מַחְלֹון), son of Elimelech (אֱלִימֶלֶךְ) after the death of Mahlon (מַחְלֹון) she married Boaz (בֹּעַז) and so became the mother of Obed (עֹובֵד) and the great grandmother of David (דָּוִד)
= inhabitant of Moab (מֹואָב)
= woman, who at some time called herself Mara (מָרָא) ► wife of Elimelech (אֱלִימֶלֶךְ) mother of Mahlon (מַחְלֹון) and Chilion (כִּלְיֹון) and mother in law of Ruth (רוּת) and Orpah (עָרְפָּה)
= action by which humans, deities, or animals move forward, usually towards a specific destination

= a piece of land outside of inhabited areas, which is the property of individuals, generally used for cultivating food trees, grain, and vegetables; can be bought and sold; property which can be transferred from one person to another
= causative action by which humans or animals bring together and take in objects from scattered places or sources
= particle linking two elements and indicating that X is located or takes place behind Y
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
literally: to find favor; hence: = state in which humans find the approval of deities or (other) humans
= state in which humans have a positive and compassionate attitude towards other humans

= one of two parts of the body of humans and animals that is used to see things, after which the observed information is stored and processed in the mind; sparkling when the body is healthy and strong, but dim when weak or sick; the eyes also play a significant role in determining whether a person is considered beautiful or not; eyes can reflect both an attitude of compassion and a sentiment of malice; ≈ high eyes are associated with pride, whereas lowly eyes are connected with humility; a good eye is associated with generosity, whereas an evil eye denotes stinginess; winking the eye is associated with underhanded practices

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= action by which humans, deities, or animals move forward, usually towards a specific destination
= title used to address a woman who is regarded with some degree of affection, ◄ as if she were the speaker's child
= action by which humans, deities, or animals move forward, usually towards a specific destination
= causative action by which humans or animals bring together and take in objects from scattered places or sources

= a piece of land outside of inhabited areas, which is the property of individuals, generally used for cultivating food trees, grain, and vegetables; can be bought and sold; property which can be transferred from one person to another
= particle linking two elements and indicating that X is located or takes place behind Y
= things that are considered to be destined to happen to someone
= object that is owned by someone; ◄ usually with the underlying assumption that it has been shared out to that person (or his ancestors) in the past

= a piece of land outside of inhabited areas, which is the property of individuals, generally used for cultivating food trees, grain, and vegetables; can be bought and sold; property which can be transferred from one person to another
= man; ◄ son of Salma (שַׂלְמָא) Salmon (שַׂלְמֹון) ► husband of Ruth (רוּת) tribe of Judah (יְהוּדָה)
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= a particular group or class of either people (as in a clan or tribe) or animals (as in a genus or species) that share common characteristics
= man; ◄ from Bethlehem (בֵּית לֶחֶם) ► husband of Noami (נָעֳמִי) father of Mahlon (מַחְלֹון) and Chilion (כִּלְיֹון) time of the Judges
= man; ◄ son of Salma (שַׂלְמָא) Salmon (שַׂלְמֹון) ► husband of Ruth (רוּת) tribe of Judah (יְהוּדָה)
= town; ◄ territory of Judah (יְהוּדָה) ► ancestral town of King David (דָּוִד)

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

Node.gloss: to bless|to praise|to greet|to congratulate|to commend
Node.definition: = causative action by which deities grant a special favor to humans, objects, or events, or by which humans invoke a deity to do the same
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= man; ◄ son of Salma (שַׂלְמָא) Salmon (שַׂלְמֹון) ► husband of Ruth (רוּת) tribe of Judah (יְהוּדָה)
= person who has been given a certain task or responsability

= a reference to an unknown person or deity; normally used with the purpose of identifying that person or deity; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that that person or deity cannot be identified
= action in which humans or deities respond to a question or situation, either by words or by actions
= person who has been given a certain task or responsability

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= referent to a female person or another object that is considered feminine
= inhabitant of Moab (מֹואָב)
literally: to turn; hence: = action by which animals, humans, or deities move back to a location where they have been before
= woman, who at some time called herself Mara (מָרָא) ► wife of Elimelech (אֱלִימֶלֶךְ) mother of Mahlon (מַחְלֹון) and Chilion (כִּלְיֹון) and mother in law of Ruth (רוּת) and Orpah (עָרְפָּה)
= the territory or rural region of a people group
= a nation and its territory; ◄ situated E. of Dead Sea (יָם־הַמֶּלַח) regarded as founded by a son of Lot (לֹוט)

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= causative action by which humans or animals bring together and take in objects from scattered places or sources
= to bring together people, animals, plants, and/or other things from different places for a common purpose
= bundle of harvested ears of grain
= particle linking two elements and indicating that X is located or takes place behind Y
= referent pointing to a specific point in time, either in the past or the future
= first half of the day, ranging from daybreak until noon; ≈ used figuratively to denote relief after a time of suffering, and associated with good as opposed to evil
particle linking an event to a point in time; = relation indicating that event X ends at point in time Y
= a reference to the actual time when a particular event takes place
= state in which humans remain in a place that is not their home for a relatively short time

= construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction
= relatively low frequency of events or short duration of an event

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= man; ◄ son of Salma (שַׂלְמָא) Salmon (שַׂלְמֹון) ► husband of Ruth (רוּת) tribe of Judah (יְהוּדָה)

= woman; ◄ from Moab (מֹואָב) ► wife of Mahlon (מַחְלֹון), son of Elimelech (אֱלִימֶלֶךְ) after the death of Mahlon (מַחְלֹון) she married Boaz (בֹּעַז) and so became the mother of Obed (עֹובֵד) and the great grandmother of David (דָּוִד)
marker denoting that the truth value of the following statement is under investigation
= title used to address a woman who is regarded with some degree of affection, ◄ as if she were the speaker's child
= action by which humans, deities, or animals move forward, usually towards a specific destination
= causative action by which humans or animals bring together and take in objects from scattered places or sources

= a piece of land outside of inhabited areas, which is the property of individuals, generally used for cultivating food trees, grain, and vegetables; can be bought and sold; property which can be transferred from one person to another
= pertaining to being different from other objects and events that are in the same range

Node.gloss: also|too|even|moreover|what is more|what is worse|furthermore|besides|both … and
Node.definition: marker pointing to information that needs to be considered in addition to previous information (either explicit or implied)
= action by which someone commits oneself to remain closely involved with another person or group, out of affection and/or solidarity

= one of two parts of the body of humans and animals that is used to see things, after which the observed information is stored and processed in the mind; sparkling when the body is healthy and strong, but dim when weak or sick; the eyes also play a significant role in determining whether a person is considered beautiful or not; eyes can reflect both an attitude of compassion and a sentiment of malice; ≈ high eyes are associated with pride, whereas lowly eyes are connected with humility; a good eye is associated with generosity, whereas an evil eye denotes stinginess; winking the eye is associated with underhanded practices

= a piece of land outside of inhabited areas, which is the property of individuals, generally used for cultivating food trees, grain, and vegetables; can be bought and sold; property which can be transferred from one person to another
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= action by which humans, deities, or animals move forward, usually towards a specific destination
= particle linking two elements and indicating that X is located or takes place behind Y
marker denoting that the truth value of the following statement is under investigation

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= particle marking a proposition as not true
literally: to touch; hence: = causative action by which humans, deities or forces cause harm to humans or objects
= state in which someone senses a feeling of needing or wanting to drink, ► which eventually leads to weakness or even death; ≈ also used in a figurative sense to denote a longing or desire
= action by which humans, deities, or animals move forward, usually towards a specific destination
= human made object of any kind, usually specified by the context, ◄ of various makings ► and made for various purposes
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= causative action by which humans let down a bucket like container attached to a rope into a well in order to draw water from it
= action by which humans assume a lying position, often in order to show respect, allegiance, or devotion
= action by which humans lay themselves down on the ground in front of another human or a deity, ► as an act of submission or respect

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
literally: to find favor; hence: = state in which humans find the approval of deities or (other) humans
= state in which humans have a positive and compassionate attitude towards other humans

= one of two parts of the body of humans and animals that is used to see things, after which the observed information is stored and processed in the mind; sparkling when the body is healthy and strong, but dim when weak or sick; the eyes also play a significant role in determining whether a person is considered beautiful or not; eyes can reflect both an attitude of compassion and a sentiment of malice; ≈ high eyes are associated with pride, whereas lowly eyes are connected with humility; a good eye is associated with generosity, whereas an evil eye denotes stinginess; winking the eye is associated with underhanded practices
= action by which humans or deities show a favorable attitude to (other) humans
= referent to the speaker or writer in a discourse
= person who comes from a foreign country and therefore has a different status from those who are native born
= action in which humans or deities respond to a question or situation, either by words or by actions
= man; ◄ son of Salma (שַׂלְמָא) Salmon (שַׂלְמֹון) ► husband of Ruth (רוּת) tribe of Judah (יְהוּדָה)

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

Node.gloss: to do|to perform|to commit|to practice|to observe|to celebrate|to keep
Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities engage in a particular action
particle linking two entities and denoting that X and Y function as one single entity in the proposition in focus
= mother of one's spouse
= particle linking two elements and indicating that X takes place after Y has ceased existing or has been completed
= process by which humans or animals stop living
= action by which humans or deities move away from an object, person, or place
= direct male progenitor; ► who normally provides protection, care, instruction, and discipline; ≈ is usually regarded with respect and associated with wisdom, security, and comfort
= direct female progenitor; ≈ associated with affection and loyalty; often extended figuratively to refer to other objects that are regarded as feminine

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land
= the community where a person was born and grew up
= action by which humans, deities, or animals move forward, usually towards a specific destination
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= process by which humans or deities acquire information about other humans, deities, or certain facts, which is stored in the mind

Node.gloss: (what used to be done) before, in the past
Node.definition: = reference to times in the past when a certain activity used to take place repeatedly
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= a fixed regular payment for work, either with money or in kind; ≈ in extension: all that happens in return for one's actions
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

Node.gloss: to take refuge|to find refuge|to find shelter
Node.definition: = action by which humans and animals who find themselves in difficult circumstances go to a certain location, ► in order to find protection or safety
= part of body; ◄ of bird, insect, celestial creature; ► used for flying but also to give protection

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
literally: to find favor; hence: = state in which humans find the approval of deities or (other) humans
= state in which humans have a positive and compassionate attitude towards other humans

= one of two parts of the body of humans and animals that is used to see things, after which the observed information is stored and processed in the mind; sparkling when the body is healthy and strong, but dim when weak or sick; the eyes also play a significant role in determining whether a person is considered beautiful or not; eyes can reflect both an attitude of compassion and a sentiment of malice; ≈ high eyes are associated with pride, whereas lowly eyes are connected with humility; a good eye is associated with generosity, whereas an evil eye denotes stinginess; winking the eye is associated with underhanded practices
= man who is in a position of authority over another person or object as a legal owner, employer, husband, or sovereign; or a person or deity who is referred to as such in a conversation or prayer

Node.gloss: to comfort|to console|to reassure|to express sympathy|to bring relief
Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities seek to make (other) humans feel relief after a time of grief, anxiety, or fear

= action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually not directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
literally: heart; hence: = the seat of knowledge, human reasoning, planning, intelligence, skill, affection and hatred, desire and satisfaction, humility and pride, courage and fear, joy and grief
= referent to the speaker or writer in a discourse
= state in which a countable entity is one in number

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= man; ◄ son of Salma (שַׂלְמָא) Salmon (שַׂלְמֹון) ► husband of Ruth (רוּת) tribe of Judah (יְהוּדָה)
= a shorter or longer moment in the passage of time
= any nutritious substance that people or animals eat or drink ► in order to maintain life and growth

Node.gloss: to approach|to come near|to draw near|to come forward
Node.definition: = action by which humans move to a location closer to a point of reference
= action by which someone consumes food; with or without explicit object
= a staple food ◄ made from a dough of water and either wheat or barley then baked; ► together with water considered the very basis of life, often used to refer to food in general
= action by which part or all of an object is put into a liquid briefly and, in most cases, soon removed; ► often to absorb some of the liquid and apply it elsewhere
= a relatively small quantity of food

= sour alcoholic liquid; ◄ by product of grape wine (יַיִן) and date wine (שֵׁכָר) due to acetous fermentation when it has been in contact with open air longer than necessary; ► used in diluted form as dip for bread, but to be avoided by Nazirites because of the alcohol; very unpleasant when it comes in contact with (bad) teeth and open wounds
= action by which humans assume a sitting position in a certain location and remain in that position for some time; ≈ sometimes associated with a certain status, role, or common activity
= relation referring to the location alongside an object or as part of that object
= ears of grain that have been cooked over a fire ► to form a meal that can be carried conveniently when traveling or working outside
= action by which someone consumes food; with or without explicit object
= process by which someone's desire for food is fulfilled

Node.gloss: to cause to remain|to leave over
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans or deities cause humans, plants, or objects to remain in existence after part of the original quantity has disappeared or has been used or dealt with in a certain way
= causative action by which humans or animals bring together and take in objects from scattered places or sources
= man; ◄ son of Salma (שַׂלְמָא) Salmon (שַׂלְמֹון) ► husband of Ruth (רוּת) tribe of Judah (יְהוּדָה)

= the area separating two or mores locations
= bundle of harvested ears of grain
= causative action by which humans or animals bring together and take in objects from scattered places or sources
= causative action by which humans cause other humans to experience a feeling of shame

Node.definition: marker pointing to information that needs to be considered in addition to previous information (either explicit or implied)
= quantity of stalks of grain ◄ carried by someone who is harvesting; ► to be tied into a bundle later
= action by which humans or deities move away from an object, person, or place
= causative action by which humans or animals bring together and take in objects from scattered places or sources
= action by which humans or deities speak to animals, humans, deities, or natural objects in anger, in order to express their displeasure and cause them to change their behavior
= causative action by which humans or animals bring together and take in objects from scattered places or sources

= a piece of land outside of inhabited areas, which is the property of individuals, generally used for cultivating food trees, grain, and vegetables; can be bought and sold; property which can be transferred from one person to another
particle linking an event to a point in time; = relation indicating that event X ends at point in time Y

= the time of day when the sun starts going down, when people leave their work and go home, have food, and go to sleep; this is also the time of the evening sacrifice, and the time when an unclean person who has gone through the cleansing rituals is declared clean, when fasting and mourning come to an end, and when the exposed body of an executed person needs to be removed
= action by which humans strike another object repeatedly + with a stick or a similar wooden instrument, ► so that items attached to this object will be released

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= causative action by which humans or animals bring together and take in objects from scattered places or sources
= a unit of dry measure of which the exact quantity is unknown and ranges between 20 and 40 liters; one ephah equals 10 omer (עֹמֶר)

= a type of cultivated grass like wheat or rice; less than 1 m tall; it produces a single head on each stalk, with rows of kernels; ◄ Hordeum distichum or Hordeum vulgare; ► its grain was used to make bread or beer, or for animal feed

Node.gloss: to take up|to lift up|to carry
Node.definition: literally: to lift up; hence: = action by which humans take hold of objects with their hands, with the intention of holding them or bringing them to another location

= relatively large and permanent population center, usually surrounded by a wall and surrounded by a number of dependent villages (חָצֵר) settlements (בַּת) and pasturelands (מִגְרָשׁ) ≈ associated with strength and security

= process or action by which living creatures perceive something, primarily though not necessarily exclusively with their eyes, either as a spontaneous incident or as the result of focusing the eyes on something
= mother of one's spouse

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= causative action by which humans or animals bring together and take in objects from scattered places or sources

Node.gloss: to bring out|to take out|to carry out|to make (someone) leave|to make (someone) depart
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans or deities cause (other) humans, animals, or objects to leave a certain place or position

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

= referent to an unknown location; ► normally used with the purpose of finding which location that is; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that such a location cannot be found
= causative action by which humans or animals bring together and take in objects from scattered places or sources

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine

= referent to an unknown location; ► normally used with the purpose of finding which location that is; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that such a location cannot be found
literally: to do; hence; = action by which humans and engaged in a specific activity, usually in the service of someone else
= action by which humans or deities show a favorable attitude to (other) humans

Node.gloss: to bless|to praise|to greet|to congratulate|to commend
Node.definition: = causative action by which deities grant a special favor to humans, objects, or events, or by which humans invoke a deity to do the same
= mother of one's spouse

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
literally: to do; hence; = action by which humans and engaged in a specific activity, usually in the service of someone else

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= one or more words by which a person, deity, place or object is known, addressed, remembered, or referred to; ≈ regarded as a core element of one's identity
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
literally: to do; hence; = action by which humans and engaged in a specific activity, usually in the service of someone else

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine
= man; ◄ son of Salma (שַׂלְמָא) Salmon (שַׂלְמֹון) ► husband of Ruth (רוּת) tribe of Judah (יְהוּדָה)

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= woman, who at some time called herself Mara (מָרָא) ► wife of Elimelech (אֱלִימֶלֶךְ) mother of Mahlon (מַחְלֹון) and Chilion (כִּלְיֹון) and mother in law of Ruth (רוּת) and Orpah (עָרְפָּה)
= wife of one's son

Node.gloss: to bless|to praise|to greet|to congratulate|to commend
Node.definition: = causative action by which deities grant a special favor to humans, objects, or events, or by which humans invoke a deity to do the same
= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= action by which humans or deities suspend their commitment to a certain pattern of behavior

= state in which humans or deities are committed towards fulfilling their obligations and show that by their actions; these obligations include responsibilities towards kinspeople, spouses, friends, covenant partners, and people to whom one is indebted as a result of favors received
particle linking two entities and denoting that X and Y function as one single entity in the proposition in focus

= state in which humans and deities are alive and well, ◄ which, for humans, requires the presence of air to breathe and food to eat; ≈ life is regarded as more than a mere physical condition; in many cases it includes health, strength, and some degree of prosperity
particle linking two entities and denoting that X and Y function as one single entity in the proposition in focus
= process by which humans or animals stop living, either spontaneously or as a result of an act of aggression

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= woman, who at some time called herself Mara (מָרָא) ► wife of Elimelech (אֱלִימֶלֶךְ) mother of Mahlon (מַחְלֹון) and Chilion (כִּלְיֹון) and mother in law of Ruth (רוּת) and Orpah (עָרְפָּה)

Node.gloss: kinship redeemer|to fulfil one's duty as kinsman|avenger
Node.definition: = a person with the duty to help close relatives regain possession of objects that used to be theirs but that have become someone else's property, which may include their own personal freedom; this person also has the responsibility to avenge the death of a relative, which can also be seen as an act of redemption
= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

= woman; ◄ from Moab (מֹואָב) ► wife of Mahlon (מַחְלֹון), son of Elimelech (אֱלִימֶלֶךְ) after the death of Mahlon (מַחְלֹון) she married Boaz (בֹּעַז) and so became the mother of Obed (עֹובֵד) and the great grandmother of David (דָּוִד)
= inhabitant of Moab (מֹואָב)

Node.gloss: also|too|even|moreover|what is more|what is worse|furthermore|besides|both … and
Node.definition: marker pointing to information that needs to be considered in addition to previous information (either explicit or implied)

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= action by which someone commits oneself to remain closely involved with another person or group, out of affection and/or solidarity
particle linking two events; = relation indicating that event X ends at the time of occurrence or completion of event Y
= set of particles linking two events and denoting that X will continue up to the moment that Y has taken place
= causative action by which deities, humans, or animals bring an activity to full completion

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= woman, who at some time called herself Mara (מָרָא) ► wife of Elimelech (אֱלִימֶלֶךְ) mother of Mahlon (מַחְלֹון) and Chilion (כִּלְיֹון) and mother in law of Ruth (רוּת) and Orpah (עָרְפָּה)

= woman; ◄ from Moab (מֹואָב) ► wife of Mahlon (מַחְלֹון), son of Elimelech (אֱלִימֶלֶךְ) after the death of Mahlon (מַחְלֹון) she married Boaz (בֹּעַז) and so became the mother of Obed (עֹובֵד) and the great grandmother of David (דָּוִד)
= wife of one's son
= state in which events are well performed, morally and ethically correct, and beneficial to others
= title used to address a woman who is regarded with some degree of affection, ◄ as if she were the speaker's child

Node.gloss: to go out|to come out|to go away|to leave|to depart
Node.definition: = action by which humans, animals, or objects leave a certain place or position
= action by which humans go and meet other humans ► with the purpose of killing or harming that person

= a piece of land outside of inhabited areas, which is the property of individuals, generally used for cultivating food trees, grain, and vegetables; can be bought and sold; property which can be transferred from one person to another
= pertaining to being different from other objects and events that are in the same range
= action by which someone commits oneself to remain closely involved with another person or group, out of affection and/or solidarity
= man; ◄ son of Salma (שַׂלְמָא) Salmon (שַׂלְמֹון) ► husband of Ruth (רוּת) tribe of Judah (יְהוּדָה)
= causative action by which humans or animals bring together and take in objects from scattered places or sources
particle linking two events; = relation indicating that event X ends at the time of occurrence or completion of event Y

Node.gloss: to be finished|to be completed|to come to an end|to be past
Node.definition: = process by which an activity comes to full completion

= a type of cultivated grass like wheat or rice; less than 1 m tall; it produces a single head on each stalk, with rows of kernels; ◄ Hordeum distichum or Hordeum vulgare; ► its grain was used to make bread or beer, or for animal feed
= cereal plant bearing dense four sided spike of grain; ◄ Triticum; ► important source of flour for bread; ≈ its color used to be regarded as the ideal color for the skin
= process by which humans make a certain place or area their home
particle linking two entities and denoting that X and Y function as one single entity in the proposition in focus
= mother of one's spouse
